title: 6c command documentation link to original man page is wrong
body:
by **jessevdk**: 
The documentation of the 6c command refers to the following link to see the original man
page:

http://plan9.bell-labs.com/magic/man2html/1/2c

However, this link does not work. It seems that the correct link to refer to is the
following:

http://plan9.bell-labs.com/magic/man2html/1/8c
